name: BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.getDescriptors
description: The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.getDescriptors() method returns a Promise that resolves to an Array of all BluetoothGATTDescriptor objects for a given descriptor UUID.

refs.name: Web Bluetooth
refs.description: The definition of 'getDescriptors()' in the 'Web Bluetooth' specification.
